description: This file defines the `AdminMenuManagementScreen` widget for a Flutter application, representing the admin interface for menu management. It includes UI components such as header, list items, and layout logic tailored for different screen sizes.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin menu management screen, including header and item list.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A private stateless widget used to display individual menu management options with styling.

methods.name: build
